subject: Re: [PATCH 09/13] cachefiles: change cachefiles_bury_object to use start_renaming_dentry()

reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown suggested removing unnecessary locking in proc_setup_self() and proc_setup_thread_self(), as the filesystem is not live yet, and it's simpler to remove the locking for centralizing directory locking.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein raised concerns about the patch series, specifically questioning the locking rules in ovl_create_real() and suggesting improvements to kernel-doc comments.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton reviewed the series and provided Reviewed-by tags for all patches except PATCH 04/13, where he pointed out a minor issue that needs to be fixed.
